pages.title: Overview
pages.purpose: Introduce state-jet, explaining what it is, its design philosophy, key features, and overall architecture at a high level

pages.title: Core Concepts
pages.purpose: Explain fundamental concepts of state-jet: global state, slices, stores, reactivity model, and the progressive complexity approach

pages.title: Version History and Migration
pages.purpose: Document version changes, breaking changes, migration guides between major versions, and the changelog

pages.title: Core API Reference
pages.purpose: Serve as the main hub for API documentation, linking to detailed pages for each core function

pages.title: useStateGlobal
pages.purpose: Complete API reference for useStateGlobal: parameters, return values, options (middleware, persist, encrypt, frameSync), and usage examples

pages.title: useSlice
pages.purpose: Complete API reference for useSlice: creating state slices, organizing related state, multi-state slices, and usage patterns

pages.title: useStore
pages.purpose: Complete API reference for useStore: aggregating slices into stores, initializer functions, and store composition patterns

pages.title: State Access Methods
pages.purpose: Document the methods returned by state objects: useState(), set(), get(), undo(), redo(), clear() with detailed usage

pages.title: Derived State
pages.purpose: Explain and document the derivedState function for computing values from other state dependencies

pages.title: Advanced Features
pages.purpose: Hub for advanced state-jet capabilities beyond basic state management

pages.title: Middleware System
pages.purpose: Comprehensive guide to middleware: architecture, execution pipeline, built-in middlewares (logger, reducer, debounce, optimistic, validation), and creating custom middleware

pages.title: State Persistence
pages.purpose: Document state persistence to localStorage: saveState, restoreState, automatic persistence via persist option, and platform considerations

pages.title: State Encryption
pages.purpose: Document encrypted state storage: saveEncryptedState, restoreEncryptedState, automatic encryption via encrypt option, security considerations

pages.title: Undo and Redo
pages.purpose: Explain history management: undo(), redo() methods, history state structure (past, present, future), and usage patterns

pages.title: Optimistic Updates
pages.purpose: Document optimisticUpdate function for immediate UI updates with rollback capability, integration patterns, and error handling

pages.title: CRDT Synchronization
pages.purpose: Explain syncCRDT and mergeCRDT functions for conflict-free replicated data types and multi-device synchronization

pages.title: Performance Optimization
pages.purpose: Document performance features: batch updates, frameSync option for animation-heavy apps, and batching mechanism

pages.title: Tutorials and Examples
pages.purpose: Hub page for practical examples and step-by-step tutorials demonstrating state-jet usage patterns

pages.title: Todo List Tutorial
pages.purpose: Step-by-step tutorial building a todo list app, demonstrating useStateGlobal for simple state management with TypeScript and JavaScript variants

pages.title: E-commerce Tutorial
pages.purpose: Comprehensive tutorial building an e-commerce app with products and cart, demonstrating useSlice and useStore patterns for complex state organization

pages.title: Example Applications Source Code
pages.purpose: Reference guide to the example applications' source code structure, dependencies, and how to run them locally

pages.title: Performance Benchmarks
pages.purpose: Document benchmark setup comparing state-jet with other state management libraries (Zustand), methodology, and results interpretation

pages.title: Developer Guide
pages.purpose: Hub for developers who want to contribute to state-jet or understand its internal implementation

pages.title: Internal Architecture
pages.purpose: Deep dive into state-jet's internal implementation: store map structure, StoreValue objects, batching system, React integration via useSyncExternalStore

pages.title: Build System
pages.purpose: Explain the build pipeline: Rollup configuration, plugin usage (esbuild, terser, dts), TypeScript compilation, multi-format output (ESM, CJS, types)

pages.title: Testing Infrastructure
pages.purpose: Document testing setup: Vitest configuration, test structure, running tests, coverage requirements, and testing patterns used in the codebase

pages.title: Release and Versioning
pages.purpose: Explain the automated release process: GitHub Actions workflow, conventional commits, standard-version, semantic versioning, and changelog generation

pages.title: Contributing Guidelines
pages.purpose: Guide for contributors: code style (ESLint, Prettier), commit conventions, PR template, pre-commit hooks, and development workflow
